title: What to Expect on Your December Trip to Chicago
text:

Chicago weather in December can vary wildly from mildly cold to downright brutal. Layers are key, and a warm jacket is a must. Here are some other important things to know when traveling to Chicago in December. 
December Events/Notes Christmas 2011 : December 25, as always -- this year Christmas is on a Sunday. Most restaurants and attractions are closed. Christmas Dinner in Chicago : Note, I said *most* restaurants are closed -- here's a list of my favorite spots to get Christmas dinner in Chicago . Christmas Around the World - November 17, 2011 - January 8, 2012 : Chicago's Museum of Science and Industry gets into the holiday spirit by taking a look at how various cultures celebrate the winter holiday across the globe. Chicago Outlet Malls : Of course one of the big activities in December is holiday shopping, and the area outlet malls offer great bargains that draw tourists from all over. Christkindlmarket Chicago - November 23 through December 24, 2011 : The largest of its kind in the United States, this German holiday market offers unique crafts and gifts for sale, a variety of entertainment, as well as German food and drinks. Lincoln Park Zoo's ZooLights - various nights through January 1, 2012 : Lincoln Park Zoo gets into the holiday season when it decks itself with lights, Santa's Safari, ice carving demonstrations, and more. Brookfield Zoo Holiday Magic - various nights through December 31, 2011 : Brookfield Zoo also breaks out the Christmas lights as well as a laser light show, carolers, and more. Winter Wonderfest at Navy Pier - December 2, 2011 - January 8, 2012 : Navy Pier turns itself into a "Winter Wonderfest" each Christmas season, featuring a number of different attractions, rides, and ice skating.
